column2: Now for our last powerup. Ready for some fireworks?
You bet!
Excellent. Launch Lightspeed.

We're going to add code so a powerup of type `'blowup'` blows up every enemy on the screen.

Click  the Flip button.

This is very similar to the other one. Click on the Powerups tab. See the `activatePowerup()` function?

Right now, the type `'invulnerable'` powerup makes us invulnerable. 

Now we want to add a setting for powerup `'blowup'`.  So if we pick up one of these, we blow up everything.

See how there's an `if (powerUpType == 'invulnerable')` check already. Add a similar one for powerup `'blowup'`.

You can blow up everything with the function `blowUpEnemies()`.
So after the code that's there already, you should have `if (powerUpType == 'blowup')`
And then `blowUpEnemies();`. And that should do it. Test it out.
Play the level to test it.
Press the *Restart* button.
Let's try again.
Press the *Restart* button.
Let's see what happens when you pick up both kinds of powerups.
All powerups seem to be doing the same thing.
Go back and make sure we have the two `if` statements.
Major fireworks! Go ahead and finish the level now with the help of the powerups!
Hmm, these powerups aren't doing anything. Go back and check.
Excellent. Okay, only one more powerup before we can get our next fob to open the box.
One picked, can you pick the other kind?.
Hmm you picked the wrong type.
You couldn't pick any powerup? Are they being spawned?
No problem, we can try it again later.
